Class Instructor

java.lang.Object
Instructor
public class Instructor extends Object
Version:
4.0
Author:
Simran Kullar, Kareena Sen (added getFIXED_PIN) The Instructor class represents an instructor user in the system It implements the User interface and provides methods to login, validate instructor, view player data, and handle user session

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Instructor(int pin)
    Constructor which initializes the list with some users, from database and the id and pin

  • Method Details

    • login

      public boolean login()
      Attempts to login an instructor with a given username
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the instructor
      Returns:
      true if login is successful, otherwise false

    • validateInstructor

      public boolean validateInstructor()
      Validates if the instructor has a valid PIN and exists in the list of instructors.
      Returns:
      true if the instructor's PIN is valid and the instructor exists, otherwise false.

    • viewPlayerData

      public void viewPlayerData(String playerIdentifier)
      Retrieves and compiles the player data including high score and achievements

    • getPin

      public String getPin()
      Retrieves the instructor's PIN
      Returns:
      The instructor's PIN as a String

    • getFIXED_PIN

      public static int getFIXED_PIN()

    • isInstructor

      public boolean isInstructor(int pin)
      Checks if the user is an instructor based on ID and PIN
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to check
      pin - The PIN of the user to check
      Returns:
      true if the user is an instructor, otherwise false

    • setPin

      public void setPin(int pin)
      Sets the instructor's PIN
      Parameters:
      pin - The new PIN for the instructor

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out the current user and resets the session
